title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Passion-Based Science Learning and Portfolio Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners conduct ≥3 passion-driven research projects on specific science topics and compile them into a portfolio for submission

Over 1–6 months, learners participate in 10 online mentoring sessions (weekly) to receive three or more project problem-solving solutions from experts, submit a 2-page improved report reflecting feedback, and meet at least four of five evaluation criteria
Learners achieve ≥80% proficiency according to portfolio evaluation criteria (depth of topic exploration, experimental design, result analysis, collaboration skills)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
